commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: The aquarium was SO much fun!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I know! I can't believe I got to shake hands with an otter!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: The penguins were cute.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: They weren't as cute as me, but they were still pretty cute!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: The penguins were cuter.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Definitely the penguins.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Uh, penguins can't sing or dance, can they?!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: No, but penguins are cute and that's that!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: W-Well, yeah, I guess... Ahem, in any case, that was fun. Your idea was exceptional, Rinako.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Nuh-uh. The penguins were. They're cute, and that makes them exceptional.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: By that logic, I'm ALSO exceptional because I'm cute too!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Are we really back to this again?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Well, I AM a school idol so nothing can EVER out-cute me!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yes, yes, of course.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh, but I don't mean to say you two aren't cute!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I don't think either of us really care...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Huh? But doesn't it make you happy when someone says you're cute

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Um... I mean, I guess?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Right?! So both you and Rinako are adorable! Penguins and otters might not be school idols, but they're cute too! I'm just the cutest of them all!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: All right, then let's leave it at that.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Bet you're totally thinking I'm a pain to deal with, huh?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: No?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: You sure? You SURE you're sure?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yes, I'm sure I'm sure. But this conversation right now is becoming one.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Grr...

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Okay, okay. That's enough, you two. What should we do next?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Oh, there IS somewhere I've been wanting to go.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh? Where?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: An anime shop!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: That place Setsuna was talking about?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yes! I've been curious ever since she described it as a dreamy wonderland, but I couldn't find the courage to go on my own. But now you two are with me so we can all go!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Yeah, let's go!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Rina-chan Board says, "Woo-hoo! Exciting!"

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Oh my goodness, really? Thank you!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Let's go, let's go! To the wonderland of dreams!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Woo!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Phew, that was a lot to take in.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: There were all kinds of anime, games, manga, and books.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That was definitely an experience...though I'd be lying if I said there wasn't anything that caught my eye. I think I'll ask Setsuna about it all later.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Like what?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Well, remember that anime Setsuna asked our Prez to record? They had the novel for it in there. It had a really nice cover, so I kinda wanted to give it a read.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Oh! I had my eye on that too!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Me too.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: It's always nice to explore a new world, huh? I've got so much to ask Setsuna about next week!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: It's amazing how much Setsuna seems to know about everything...

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Hmm? Oh! It's Nico.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: You're right. And Hanayo and Rin are with her. Is it just the three of them out today?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Well, isn't this a fun little coincidence! I wonder what they're doing here? I've gotta find out!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Wanna call out to them?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Are you sure it's a good idea to randomly go up to them like that?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Then let's tail 'em!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: You don't have a filter on those wild suggestions, do you?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I thought something like this might happen, so I brought these! Tada! Disguises!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: When did you even...?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Giggle* I bought them at the shop we just went to. I thought we could use them on stage or something.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Do you really think we'd ever use these...?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh, so you're not coming with? What if they're all hiding some kind of crazy secret or something?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Are we really going to do this?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh you're such a goody-two-shoes! Less thinking, more moving! Let's go!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Commence operations!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: *Sigh*
